com.stormpath.sdk.provider

Interface ProviderAccountRequestBuilder<T extends ProviderAccountRequestBuilder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the specific builder class (e.g FacebookAccountRequestBuilder or GoogleAccountRequestBuilder.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FacebookAccountRequestBuilder, GoogleAccountRequestBuilder

    public interface ProviderAccountRequestBuilder<T extends ProviderAccountRequestBuilder<T>>
    A Builder to construct ProviderAccountRequests.
    Since:
    1.0.beta

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProviderAccountRequest build()
      Creates a new ProviderAccountRequest instance based on the current builder state.
      T setAccessToken(String accessToken)
      Setter for the Provider App authorization code.
